name: The Two-Side Experiment
description:
You have been chosen by Edis Owt and The Narrator to try out their short experiment. 
Go through a series of 7 short minigames that relies on how you decide to play it. 

There currently are only two endings, a bad and a good one.  
Credist: Art - Toasted Toast, Music - Toasted Toast, Sound Effects - https://freesound.org/

Thanks for playing, make sure to rate it if you can.
